## About

This page provides some supplemental resources pertaining to the [Week 7 Constructivism: Deep Dive](https://psu-psychology.github.io/psy-548-2025-fall/schedule.html#friday-october-10-2025) class discussion.

## Animacy animations

Simulation of abstract shape movement patterns that can trigger explanations in terms of animacy.
